title: Story: Parallel Work Documentation
description:
Create comprehensive documentation for the parallel work feature including tutorials, how-to guides, and reference documentation.

## Goal

Enable users and agents to successfully adopt parallel multi-agent work through clear, practical documentation.

## Tasks

1. **Tutorial: Parallel Work with Git Worktrees** - Step-by-step guide for first-time setup
2. **How-To: Multi-Agent Coordination** - Recipes for common coordination patterns
3. **Reference: Claim Commands** - Complete command reference with all options
4. **Reference: Configuration Options** - All config settings with defaults and examples
5. **Troubleshooting Guide** - Common issues and resolutions
6. **Migration Guide** - Upgrading from single-worktree to parallel mode

## Success Criteria

- New user can set up parallel work in <15 minutes following tutorial
- All commands documented with examples
- Configuration options explained with use cases
- Common errors have documented solutions
- Documentation follows Diátaxis framework

## References

See design document `dev/design/worktree-parallel-work.md`:
- Section "Example Usage" for typical workflows
- Section "Migration Path" for phased adoption
- Full document as technical reference

## Dependencies

Requires all implementation stories complete for accurate documentation
